TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed InsertItemPosition extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the location of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> template when it is rendered as part of the control.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control that is configured to display the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> template as the last item in the control.
> [!IMPORTANT] > This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
[!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.web.ui.webcontr_34_1.aspx)] [!code-cs[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemInserted#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.web.ui.webcontr_34_1.aspx)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.InsertItemPosition FirstItem = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> template is rendered as the first item in the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.InsertItemPosition LastItem = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> template is rendered as the last item in the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.InsertItemPosition None = int32(0)
